Desc.entry: Cycling club for people aged 16 years and over who would like to train with a view to race at novice to expert level and to reach an ability where they would be willing to work with team-mates as part of a winning team. Timetrailing and mountain biking encouraged as part of the build up to road racing. Events include Chaingang and club runs. BMX riders are welcome and encouraged to participate in all branches of cycle sport from fun and leisure to race or competition. Also have contacts for ladies cycle rides. Offers help and advice on cycle maintenance and race tactics. Full medical examination before training and racing recommended.

Telephone.entry: Olive and Nigel, Tues, Thurs & Sat 2.30-4.30pm
